title: Apple refreshes iPhone 15 case and Apple Watch band colors for the spring
content:
Macworld

As it does almost every year, Apple has updated its selection of cases for the latest iPhone and bands for Apple Watches to include springtime colors.

There are four new colors available for Apple’s Silicone Case with MagSafe (available for all iPhone 15 models), all with a strong “springtime” aesthetic: Sunshine, Pink, Soft Mint, and Light Blue.

Several different Apple Watch bands got updated colors as well, though the available colors varies by band type. They include the Hermès bands sold by Apple.

  • Solo Loop: Ocean Blue, Soft Mint, Pink
  • Sport Loop: Ocean Blue, Soft Mint
  • Sport Band: Light Blue, Soft Mint, Sunshine
  • Braided Solo Loop: Light Blue, Raspberry, Sunshine
  • Hermès Kilim Single Tour: Blanc, Bleu Céleste
  • Hermès Toile H Single Tour: Bleu Céleste/Écru, Framboise/Écru
  • Hermès Twill Jump Single Tour: Bleu Céleste/Bleu Jean, Jaune d’Or/Bleu Jean

Notably, none of Apple’s FineWoven products have recieved color updates. The FineWoven cases, wallets, and bands have been almost universally panned as an expensive and poor-quality replacement for Apple’s previous leather products.
